creditline: Gift of Gerald Ray Nelson and Joanne Hogan Nelson
description: man wearing a green tunic, green leggings and red cap in foreground, holding a shining gold coin in one hand and the top edge of a large bag of gold in the other hand; old woman wearing a blue and white cap, yellow blouse and blue striped skirt, leaning on a cane, looks into bag of gold; forest landscape in background, with rabbit peering over tree roots at right; two gold diggers in background
provenance: The artist; his stepdaughter, Joanie Nelson, Vancouver, WA
title: Untitled [man with bag of gold with old woman]
